QAPair.Question: What is (are) Pneumonia - children - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: Your child has pneumonia, which is an infection in the lungs. Now that your child is going home, follow the health care provider's instructions on helping your child continue healing at home. Use the information below as a reminder.
